name: Respondents who correctly classified activities in vignettes as innovative or non-innovative in the pilot study, according to the reason the non-innovative activity was not innovative: 2019
description: Respondents who correctly classified activities in vignettes as innovative or non-innovative in the pilot study, according to the reason the non-innovative activity was not innovative: 2019

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: reason_the_non_innovative_activity_was_not_innovative
variableMeasured.description: Reason The Non Innovative Activity Was Not Innovative

notes: Each vignette had two versions—one version described an individual innovation and the other one did not. See appendix b for a complete listing of vignettes.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Individual Innovation Survey, 2019.
